en.title: FE Spokesman Jean Daniels at Langkawi Geopark International Golf Festival 14th - 15th March 2009.
en.content:
SUBMITTED BY FE LEADERS, SUNGEI PETANI, KEDAH. 

FE Spokesman, International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Mr.Jean Daniel was invited to Langkawi's Geopark International Golf Festival on 14th - 15th March 2009. The golf tournament had 180 players competing 2 days for the championship.

Jean Daniels demonstrated his amazing golf skills for both days and successfully defeated 5 challengers on long drive tee-off ON BOTH KNEES! He also did demonstrations with FE's Quantum Pendant to the enthusiastic crowd at the Grand Dinner and Prize Presentation on the final day. FE's Spokesman, former World No 1 Badminton Champion, Foo Kok Keong, also attended the event. Fe's Quantum Pendant was well received by the crowd who were very impressed by its power!

Big Thanks to JD! Well Done and Cheers from all of us! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!
